    Deprecated API

    Contents

    • Methods
    • Constructors
    • Deprecated Methods
      Method
      Description
      neqsim.fluidmechanics.flowsystem.twophaseflowsystem.twophasepipeflowsystem.TwoPhasePipeFlowSystem.solveSteadyState(int)
      Use TwoPhasePipeFlowSystem.solve() or TwoPhasePipeFlowSystem.solveSteadyState(UUID) instead. Set the solver type using TwoPhasePipeFlowSystem.setSolverType(TwoPhaseFixedStaggeredGridSolver.SolverType) before calling. This method ignores the type parameter and uses the configured solver type enum.
      neqsim.fluidmechanics.geometrydefinitions.internalgeometry.wall.MaterialLayer.getCv()
      Use MaterialLayer.getSpecificHeatCapacity() instead
      neqsim.fluidmechanics.geometrydefinitions.internalgeometry.wall.MaterialLayer.setCv(double)
      Use MaterialLayer.setSpecificHeatCapacity(double) instead
      neqsim.physicalproperties.system.PhysicalPropertyModel.getValue()
      neqsim.process.controllerdevice.ModelPredictiveController.setEnergyReference(double)
      Use ModelPredictiveController.setPreferredControlValue(double) when configuring the MPC economic target. This method is kept for compatibility with earlier code samples.
      neqsim.process.controllerdevice.ModelPredictiveController.setEnergyReferenceVector(double...)
      Use ModelPredictiveController.setPreferredControlVector(double...) to configure the nominal control point. This method is retained for backwards compatibility with earlier snapshots of the MPC implementation.
      neqsim.process.equipment.absorber.SimpleAbsorber.getOutStream()
      use SimpleAbsorber.getOutletStream() instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.absorber.SimpleAbsorber.getOutStream(int)
      use SimpleAbsorber.getOutletStream(int) instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.absorber.SimpleAbsorber.getOutTemperature(int)
      use SimpleAbsorber.getOutletTemperature(int) instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.absorber.SimpleAbsorber.setOutTemperature(double)
      use SimpleAbsorber.setOutletTemperature(double) instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.adsorber.SimpleAdsorber.getOutStream(int)
      use SimpleAdsorber.getOutletStream(int) instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.adsorber.SimpleAdsorber.getOutTemperature(int)
      use SimpleAdsorber.getOutletTemperature(int) instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.adsorber.SimpleAdsorber.setOutTemperature(double)
      use SimpleAdsorber.setOutletTemperature(double) instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.compressor.Compressor.setOutTemperature(double)
      use Compressor.setOutletTemperature(double) instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.diffpressure.Orifice.setOrificeParameters(Double, Double, Double)
      Use constructor parameters instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.heatexchanger.Heater.setOutStream(StreamInterface)
      neqsim.process.equipment.heatexchanger.Heater.setOutTemperature(double)
      use Heater.setOutletTemperature(double) instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.heatexchanger.MultiStreamHeatExchanger.setOutTemperature(double)
      use MultiStreamHeatExchanger.setOutletTemperature(double) instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.heatexchanger.MultiStreamHeatExchangerInterface.setOutTemperature(double)
      use MultiStreamHeatExchangerInterface.setOutletTemperature(double) instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.mixer.Mixer.getOutTemperature()
      use Mixer.getOutletTemperature() instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.mixer.Mixer.setOutTemperature(double)
      use Mixer.setOutletTemperature(double) instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.mixer.MixerInterface.getOutStream()
      use MixerInterface.getOutletStream() instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.pipeline.PipeBeggsAndBrills.isUseOverallHeatTransferCoefficient()
      Use PipeBeggsAndBrills.getHeatTransferMode() instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.pipeline.PipeBeggsAndBrills.setRunIsothermal(boolean)
      Use PipeBeggsAndBrills.setHeatTransferMode(HeatTransferMode) with PipeBeggsAndBrills.HeatTransferMode.ISOTHERMAL instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.pipeline.PipeBeggsAndBrills.setUseOverallHeatTransferCoefficient(boolean)
      Use PipeBeggsAndBrills.setHeatTransferMode(HeatTransferMode) instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.pipeline.PipeLineInterface.setOutPressure(double)
      use PipeLineInterface.setOutletPressure(double) instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.pipeline.PipeLineInterface.setOutTemperature(double)
      use PipeLineInterface.setOutletTemperature(double) instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.pipeline.twophasepipe.TransientPipe.setinletPressureValue(double)
      Use TransientPipe.setInletPressure(double) instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.pipeline.twophasepipe.TransientPipe.setoutletPressureValue(double)
      Use TransientPipe.setOutletPressure(double) instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.pump.Pump.setOutTemperature(double)
      use Pump.setOutletTemperature(double) instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.TwoPortInterface.getInStream()
      neqsim.process.equipment.TwoPortInterface.getOutStream()
      use TwoPortInterface.getOutletStream() instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.TwoPortInterface.setOutPressure(double)
      use TwoPortInterface.setOutletPressure(double) instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.TwoPortInterface.setOutPressure(double, String)
      use TwoPortInterface.setOutletPressure(double, String) instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.TwoPortInterface.setOutTemperature(double)
      use TwoPortInterface.setOutletTemperature(double) instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.TwoPortInterface.setOutTemperature(double, String)
      use TwoPortInterface.setOutletTemperature(double, String) instead
      neqsim.process.equipment.util.Recycle.getOutStream()
      neqsim.process.mechanicaldesign.pipeline.PipeMechanicalDesignCalculator.loadDesignFactorsFromDatabase(String)
      Use PipelineMechanicalDesign.loadDesignFactorsFromDatabase() instead. The PipelineMechanicalDesign class provides centralized database access via PipelineMechanicalDesignDataSource, following the same pattern as separators.
      neqsim.process.mechanicaldesign.pipeline.PipeMechanicalDesignCalculator.loadFromDatabase(String, String)
      Use PipelineMechanicalDesign.loadFromDatabase() instead. The PipelineMechanicalDesign class provides centralized database access via PipelineMechanicalDesignDataSource, following the same pattern as separators.
      neqsim.process.mechanicaldesign.pipeline.PipeMechanicalDesignCalculator.loadMaterialFromDatabase(String)
      Use PipelineMechanicalDesign.loadMaterialFromDatabase(String) instead. The PipelineMechanicalDesign class provides centralized database access via PipelineMechanicalDesignDataSource, following the same pattern as separators.
      neqsim.process.mechanicaldesign.SystemMechanicalDesign.generateJsonSummary()
      Use SystemMechanicalDesign.toJson() instead for proper Gson serialization
      neqsim.process.processmodel.ProcessModel.runAsThread()
      Use ProcessModel.runAsTask() instead for better resource management. This method creates a new unmanaged thread directly.
      neqsim.process.processmodel.ProcessModule.runAsThread()
      Use ProcessModule.runAsTask() instead for better resource management. This method creates a new unmanaged thread directly.
      neqsim.process.processmodel.ProcessSystem.runAsThread()
      Use ProcessSystem.runAsTask() instead for better resource management. This method creates a new unmanaged thread directly.
      neqsim.thermo.characterization.LumpingModel.PVTLumpingModel.setNumberOfPseudoComponents(int)
      Use LumpingModel.StandardLumpingModel.setNumberOfLumpedComponents(int) for PVTlumpingModel to directly control the number of plus fraction groups without side effects.
      neqsim.thermo.mixingrule.CPAMixingRuleType.getValue()
      neqsim.thermo.mixingrule.EosMixingRuleType.getValue()
      neqsim.thermo.phase.PhaseType.getValue()
      neqsim.thermo.system.SystemInterface.getNumberOfMoles()
      Replaced by SystemInterface.getTotalNumberOfMoles()
    • Deprecated Constructors
      Constructor
      Description
      neqsim.chemicalreactions.chemicalequilibrium.ChemEq()
      This constructor is incomplete and may cause NPE. Use ChemEq(double, double, double[][], double[], double[], double[]) instead.
      neqsim.process.equipment.util.MPFMfitter()
      neqsim.process.equipment.util.MPFMfitter(StreamInterface)
      neqsim.process.equipment.util.SetPoint()
      neqsim.process.equipment.util.Setter()
      neqsim.process.fielddevelopment.economics.CashFlowEngine(NorwegianTaxModel)
      Use CashFlowEngine(TaxModel) or CashFlowEngine(String) instead
